Reviews.Title: Bad
Reviews.Author: cAtAsTrApHiE
Reviews.Content: I bought my tv at a best buy brand freakin new. First two months the tv started cutting out on me whenever I chose to play a game on my ps3, it even cuts out when I load in anything like a DVD or a bluray the screen will go blank like its loading but it goes longer then 20 seconds, I fixed this problem by turning off then turning it back on. I have this tv for 5 in a half months now its dead. Like the other commenter said "nothing can be done about this" and its true. Don't spend money on this. Save 200 more hundred then you'll probably get a more reliable led tv.

Reviews.Title: This is a do not return item from seller!!!  must return to mfg.
Reviews.Author: Lee A. Thibodeaux
Reviews.Content: I should have listened to reviews..The TV is a scam !! once you buy you can't return to place of purchase.There is a large card in box saying DO NOT RETURN TO STORE!!!The buttons on side of TV don't work & are poorly designed.The TV IS TRASH..BACK LIT LED HA .. A JOKE..you have to call Westinghouse to get a code to have tuner to work..HDMI didn't work properly, TV has weird set up ..HAVE TO DISPUTE PURCHASE WITH CREDIT CARD !!!!NOT A GOOD DEAL !!SPEND $100 more & get a better TV you will be happy you did..

Reviews.Title: Dead in less than 6 months
Reviews.Author: Lotsabooks Littletime
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV and installed it 4/20/2012. On 10/14/2012 -- less than 6 months after taking it out of the box -- the TV wouldn't power on. The TV was dead. Based on my experience and the other reviews here, there seems to be a pattern with this TV. Wish I had seen the reviews before I purchased what I thought was a bargain at the time. If you're shopping for a new TV, I recommend looking at another brand. You may pay more but you'll have a TV that's made to last longer than 6 months.

Reviews.Title: Good TV (So Far) at a great Price
Reviews.Author: Woodlands69
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV 7 months ago and have had good success so far. I read the reviews and was a bit concerned, however, for the price ($399) I decided to take a gamble. After using my first purchase for 5 months ,with no issues, I bought another one for $299 on clearance and have been using it for the past 2 month incident free. I agree, sound can be an issue, however, both TV's are connected to surround so I do not rely on the TV's speakers.Picture clarity is good.

Reviews.Title: TV quality is the worse and their customer service sucks
Reviews.Author: vivek
Reviews.Content: If you are thinking "ohh very nice TV for cheap price", Lemme tell you, your tv will be broke wihtin few months and you wont get your money back or even replacement. Doesn't matter whether you have warranty and stuff. It is made out of the cheapest quality material possible.

Reviews.Title: WORTHLESS product- Buyer beware!
Reviews.Author: J. Salzenstein "Style Editor"
Reviews.Content: Horrible product- we bought this TV 6 months ago on "super sale" at BB, knowing we wouldn't use it in our "new" gameroom until it was completed.  After finally completing the remodel, I set up the media system, and... no power. Nothing. TV won't go on at all.  Reading the reviews and warnings from this and MANY other sites, I realize how stupid I was. I'll never buy a Westinghouse product again.

Reviews.Title: Dead in 13 Months
Reviews.Author: JS26
Reviews.Content: I was stoked while the TV worked because it was a decent picture, it had a small bezel, a very thin profile and it was only $400. I thought I was beating the system because I wasn't paying for a gimmicky smart tv or yellow pixel or whatever new 'critical' feature was being pushed at the time. After 13 months (1 month out of warranty), the screen was blank after power up. Researching parts shows that it may be the power board or LCD matrix controller which will cost close to $100. Next time, I'll spend the money for higher quality. Just an awful experience with Westinghouse here.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy a Westinghouse TV
Reviews.Author: dad
Reviews.Content: My Westinghouse 46" LED TV 1080p 120 hz only lasted 1 1/2 years.  Do not buy a Westinghouse TV; period!  Look at all the bad reviews online about them...there are hundreds and hundreds of bad reviews and bad customer service calls with Westinghouse.  DO NOT BE SWAYED BY THE LOW PRICES.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Chip
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV about 10 months ago, and it still works very well. The image quality is great, and the sound is all right, I use an external sound system anyway. When I bought this from Bestbuy, its ratings were somewhere between 4 and 5 stars. I have no idea how much longer it's going to last, and I don't see any cheap materials, everything works just fine. I looked at my friends top brands TVs and I couldn't tell what was the difference. So far I love it!

ProductInfo.Features:
46" screen measured diagonally from corner to corner For optimal viewing in large rooms.
Ultraslim design (1-1/2" deep) Comes with a stand or can be mounted on the wall (with optional mounting kit, not included). VESA 200mm x 200mm compliant.
4000:1 native contrast ratio (100,000:1 dynamic) For an arresting viewing experience.
Two 10W speakers Deliver a lush soundscape
Inputs Include 1 PC, 3 HDMI, 1 component video, 1 composite and 1 RF antenna.
ProductInfo.Name: Westinghouse EW46T4LZ 46" Class 1080p 120Hz LED HDTV
